Description_lang: Protects the paladin from all damage and spells for $d, but reduces all damage you deal by $s1%.  Once protected, the target cannot be protected by Divine Shield, Divine Protection or Hand of Protection again for $25771d.  Cannot be used within $61987d. of using Avenging Wrath.
AuraDescription_lang: Immune to all attacks and spells, but reduces all damage you deal by $s1%.
